creator: apache@xrealm.com.au
text:
unable to download any win32 version of 2.2.12
no mirror or backup sites have the files

creator: wrowe@apache.org
text:
This is not a bug.  Actually, it might be a doc bug if there is a link
from download.xml to a nonexistant file.

The Apache httpd project ships source code.  Individual committers contribute
binaries at their leisure for convenience of the community, but the absence
or presence of these is not a flaw.
